text:
Metro Mirage Hotel Newport Published on : Tuesday, September 29, 2015
Metro Hospitality Group, the owner and operator of multiple Metro properties across Australia, has announced that it has taken over management of a hotel and event centre located on Pittwater on Sydney’s Northern Beaches.The property will be re-branded to Metro Mirage Hotel Newport with a takeover date effective immediately.
Metro Mirage Hotel Newport located 45 minutes from Sydney’s CBD and 20 minutes from famous Palm Beach, offers 47 four-star hotel rooms including 9 waterfront spa suites as well as an outdoor swimming pool and spa, restaurant overlooking Pittwater, fully equipped gym, WiFi, 24 hour reception and private jetty for arrival by water.
The boutique waterfront hotel and event centre features a custom-built conference centre which is ideal for all types of corporate and private events up to 130 attendees. The Mirage Reception Room is extremely popular for wedding parties, with the hotel also offering a wedding consultant service to assist with planning and guidance.
Metro Mirage Hotel Newport, overlooking Sydney’s 2nd largest waterway, is opposite iconic Newport Arms Hotel and adjacent to many surf beaches, bushwalking, golf and catered cruises. “Metro Mirage Hotel Newport is an exciting and strategic addition to our portfolio” said Managing Director, Peter Frawley.
“This fantastic mid-market hotel will strengthen our position in the conference and venue market as well as marking the beginning of what we anticipate to be a period of rapid growth as a hotel management company” he added Keywords: Metro Mirage Hotel Newport, Metro Hotels, Sydney hotels, Newport hotels, wedding Sydney, Wedding venue Sydney, Mirage Newport
